Course taken: Bachelor Degree of Computer Science in Data Science 
Related Coursework: Programming, Web Development, Application Development, Statistical Analysis, Data Science, Artificial 
Intelligence and Machine Learning. 
Results: CGPA 3.84 
WORKING EXPERIENCE

▪

▪

▪
Communicate with parents and provide updates and suggestion for students.  
CIMA LIGHTING SDN. BHD.  – Showroom Assistant; Kuala Lumpur       Jan2023 - June 2023

▪

▪

▪
Got the “Top Sales Award” for May 2023.

▪
Conducted lesson for primary school students. 
▪

▪
Guide students on their work and performance.

▪
Lead the society whenever there is performance, competition, activities etc.  
▪
Implemented some new system in the society to ensure smooth flow, high consistency and highly repeatable in the future.

▪
Strong communicating skills, leadership skills, critical thinking and programming logic. 
▪
Currently exploring AI and Web3 for knowledge enhancement.  
▪
Interests: Basketball, Swimming, Programming
